content: Kinda curious how the budding US ecosystem for patients authorized exchange compares with other countries. We have a nice start, but are limited in deployment (only Epic fully open really) and content (CCDS only currently)
What other countries have a patient auth framework in the wild? What's the content and deployment like?
I have no clue but maybe we should start a gdoc or Confluence page to start surveying the known world
The BMJ patient panel has representatives from at least a dozen countries, maybe 20+
